results.title: Simvastatin Attenuates Cardiac Fibrosis under Pathophysiological Conditions of Heart Failure with Preserved Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction by Inhibiting TGF-beta Signaling.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ treatment markedly attenuated @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@cardiac fibrosis@@@ and reduced @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction_Left</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018487 @@@cardiac diastolic dysfunction@@@.

results.title: Anti-inflammatory effects of simvastatin in patients with chronic heart failure.

results.title: Diastolic function parameters are improved by the addition of simvastatin to enalapril-based treatment in hypertensive individuals.
results.text_hl: The aim of this study was to investigate in a prospective, double-blinded, placebo-controlled randomized design the additive effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction_Left</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018487 @@@DD@@@ in @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@-treated @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with average @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ levels.
